resources.string: As this is your first time, lets get a calibration score to compare against in the future.
When You\'re Ready Tap The Screen To Begin
As this is your first time, let\'s see what you have to do
The aim of the inspection task is for you to find the darker coloured beer and remember where it is
The beers are then removed. Simply touch the area you thought you saw the beer. \n That\'s it!
The aim of the sequence task is for you to select the numbers in order from 1 onwards
When clicked in the right order the numbers disappear. \nYou goal is to clear all the numbers as quickly as possible.
There are 3 levels, each with increasing amounts of numbers.
